@@  917 I/O AVE UP FOR AUCTION!!  @@
@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
                                      
 Come make your bid on a lovely and   
 elegant single family home at 917    
 I/O Ave. this Sunday night at 11 pm  
 HST.                                 
                                      
 Chameleon hosts this auction of      
 Sheriff GaryM's old dwelling before  
 his purchase of 93 Randy Rd. Cleaned 
 up, this house makes for a great     
 investment! Come and place your bid! 
@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
                    2                   


     JANET PLEADS FOR HELP!!    

                                      
 "I've opened a Travel Agency designed
 to assist Humans visiting Habitat -- 
 especially those visiting for the    
 first time."                         
                                      
 "But, I've found it difficult to     
 describe this world to the folks in  
 that world, and I need help. That's  
 why I'm sponsoring a contest -- the  
 "Habitat for Mere Humans" contest."  


                    3                   


  WIN PRIZES FOR DESCRIBING HAB 

                                      
  "There are 2 categories:            
                                      
 1) What Habitat is; and              
 2) Why a human would want to visit.  
                                      
 "Two prizes will be awarded for each 
 category -- 1st place gets 5 free    
 hours of plus time, 2nd place wins   
 a Lucasfilm game! See the next page  
 for the rules."                      


                    4                   


 "HABITAT FOR MERE HUMANS" RULES

 1) Deadline for Entries is Friday,   
    April 8, 1988. Entries should be  
    H-mailed to 'Habitravel' and must 
    fit on ONE piece of Habitat mail. 
 2) Contestants may enter as many     
    times as they wish, but will be   
    eligible to win only one prize.   
 3) All entries become the property   
    of Quantum Computer Services,     
    which reserves the right to adapt,
    use or publish any or all entries.


                    5                   


 GOOD LUCK! MAY THE BEST WIN!!  

                                      
 4) Decisions of the judges are       
    final.                            
 5) Members of the Habitat            
    Development and Support staff are 
    not eligible to enter.            
                                      
 "Good luck to all entrants! I look   
 forward to your help. And Thanks!"   
                                      
                Avatar Janet          

